P1 (SB): 980.00 chips | bet 20.00 | active
Your hole: 2♥, 2♠
==============================================
rounds.response:
Still pre-flop, I’m in the Big Blind with 2♥ 2♠ — a small pocket pair.  
Eff-stack vs. the small-blind is 990 vs 980 (about 50 bb), so there’s plenty of play left. With a set-mining hand I want to see the flop cheaply.

The pot is 30 chips and the current bet to match is 20 (P1’s small-blind raise). I have already posted 10 as the big blind, so I need to call 10 more chips. Calling offers me about 4:1 implied odds (30-pot : 10-to-call), which is thin for set-mining (ideally 8:1+), but in a heads-up pot with position post-flop and stacks deep enough to realize value when I hit, the small call is fine. No reason to put in a larger raise out-of-position; I’m happier taking the flop.

[Call]
